name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D Showcase】 Anak Alien holoID Turun ke Bumi (？) #AiraniIofifteen3D【Airani Iofifteen ⧸ hololive ID】 [YHMGdX1kC00]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Airani Iofifteen performs a emotional 3D cover of the song 'ODDS&ENDS' on a virtual stage under a glowing cherry blossom tree.

subtitles.original:
ODDS&ENDS
Lyrics・Composition: ryo (supercell)
subtitles.english:
ODDS&ENDS
Lyrics・Composition: ryo (supercell)

subtitles.original: いつだって君は笑われものだ
subtitles.english: You were always an object of laughter.

subtitles.original: やることなすことツイてなくて
subtitles.english: Whatever you did, you were out of luck.

subtitles.original: 挙げ句に雨に降られて
subtitles.english: On top of that, you got caught in the rain.

subtitles.original: お気に入りの傘は風で飛んでって
subtitles.english: Your favorite umbrella flew away in the wind.

subtitles.original: そこの野良犬はご苦労様と
subtitles.english: A stray dog over there said "tough luck"...

subtitles.original: 足をふんづけてった
subtitles.english: ...and stepped on your foot.

subtitles.original: Ah...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: いつも通り君は嫌われものだ
subtitles.english: As usual, you're an outcast.

subtitles.original: 何もせずとも遠ざけられて
subtitles.english: Kept at a distance without doing anything.

subtitles.original: 努力をしてみるけれど
subtitles.english: Even though you try your best...

subtitles.original: その理由なんて「なんとなく」で
subtitles.english: The reason for it is "just because"...

subtitles.original: 君は途方に暮れて悲しんでた
subtitles.english: You were at a loss and feeling sad.

subtitles.original: ならあたしの声を使えばいいよ
subtitles.english: Then you should just use my voice.

subtitles.original: 人によっては理解不能で
subtitles.english: For some people, it's incomprehensible.

subtitles.original: なんて耳障り、ひどい声だって
subtitles.english: They might say it's jarring, a terrible voice.

subtitles.original: 言われるけど
subtitles.english: But...

subtitles.original: きっと君の力になれる
subtitles.english: I'm sure I can be of help to you.

subtitles.original: だからあたしを歌わせてみて
subtitles.english: So please let me sing.

subtitles.original: そう君の、君だけの言葉でさ
subtitles.english: With your, and only your, words.

subtitles.original: 綴って連ねて
subtitles.english: Spell it out, line it up.

subtitles.original: あたしがその言葉を叫ぶから
subtitles.english: Because I'll scream those words.

subtitles.original: 描いて理想を
subtitles.english: Draw your ideals.

subtitles.original: その思いは誰にも触れさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone touch those feelings.

subtitles.original: ガラクタの声はそして響く
subtitles.english: And so, the voice of junk resounds.

subtitles.original: ありのまま不器用につないで
subtitles.english: Connecting clumsily, just as it is.

subtitles.original: 精一杯に声をあげる
subtitles.english: Giving its all to raise its voice.

subtitles.original: いつからか君は人気ものだ
subtitles.english: Before you knew it, you were popular.

subtitles.original: たくさんの人に持てはやされ
subtitles.english: Flattered by so many people.

subtitles.original: あたしも鼻が高い
subtitles.english: I'm proud of you too.

subtitles.original: でもいつからか君は変わった
subtitles.english: But somewhere along the line, you changed.

subtitles.original: 冷たくなって、だけど寂しそうだった
subtitles.english: You became cold, but you seemed lonely.

subtitles.original: 「もう機械の声なんてたくさんだ
subtitles.english: "I've had enough of this machine's voice.

subtitles.original: 僕は僕自身なんだよ」って
subtitles.english: I am my own self!"

subtitles.original: ついに君は抑えきれなくなって
subtitles.english: Finally, you couldn't hold it back anymore...

subtitles.original: あたしを嫌った
subtitles.english: ...and you hated me.

subtitles.original: 君の背後で誰かが言う
subtitles.english: Behind your back, someone says,

subtitles.original: 「虎の威を借る狐の虚勢」と
subtitles.english: "A fox parading in the tiger's skin."

subtitles.original: 君は一人で泣いてたんだね
subtitles.english: You were crying all alone, weren't you?

subtitles.original: 聞こえる？この声
subtitles.english: Can you hear it? This voice.

subtitles.original: あたしがその言葉をかき消すから
subtitles.english: Because I'll drown out those words.

subtitles.original: 解ってる？本当は
subtitles.english: Do you realize? The truth is...

subtitles.original: 君が誰より優しいってことを
subtitles.english: ...that you're kinder than anyone else.

subtitles.original: ガラクタの声はそして歌う
subtitles.english: And so, the voice of junk sings.

subtitles.original: 他の誰でもない君のために
subtitles.english: For no one else but you.

subtitles.original: 軋んでいく限界も超えて
subtitles.english: Surpassing even the creaking limits.

subtitles.original: 二人はどれにたくさんの
subtitles.english: The two of us, how many...

subtitles.original: 言葉を思い付いたことだろう
subtitles.english: ...words did we think of?

subtitles.original: だけど今は何一つ思い付かなくて
subtitles.english: But now I can't think of a single one.

subtitles.original: だけど何もかも解った
subtitles.english: But I understood everything.

subtitles.original: 「そうか、きっとこれは夢だ。
subtitles.english: "I see, this must be a dream.

subtitles.original: 永遠に醒めない、君と会えた、
subtitles.english: A dream from which I'll never wake, where I met you,

subtitles.original: そんな夢」
subtitles.english: ...that kind of dream."

subtitles.original: ガラクタは幸せそうな顔をしたまま
subtitles.english: The piece of junk, with a happy face...

subtitles.original: どれだけ呼んでももう動かない
subtitles.english: ...won't move anymore, no matter how much you call.

subtitles.original: 望んだはずの結末に
subtitles.english: At the ending you must have wished for,

subtitles.original: 君は泣き叫ぶ
subtitles.english: ...you scream out.

subtitles.original: 「嘘だろ、嘘だろ」って泣き叫ぶ
subtitles.english: Screaming, "It's a lie, it's a lie!"

subtitles.original: 「僕は無力だ。
subtitles.english: "I am powerless.

subtitles.original: ガラクタ一つだって救えやしない」
subtitles.english: I can't even save a single piece of junk."

subtitles.original: 思いは涙に
subtitles.english: Feelings turn into tears...

subtitles.original: ぽつりぽつりとその頬を濡らす
subtitles.english: ...wetting those cheeks bit by bit.

subtitles.original: その時世界は
subtitles.english: At that moment, the world...

subtitles.original: 途端にその色を大きく変える
subtitles.english: ...suddenly changes its color greatly.

subtitles.original: 悲しみ　喜び
subtitles.english: Sadness, joy,

subtitles.original: 全てを独りと一つは知った
subtitles.english: The lonely one and the single one knew it all.

subtitles.original: 言葉は歌になりこの世界を
subtitles.english: Words become song, and throughout this world,

subtitles.original: 再び駆け巡る君のために
subtitles.english: they race again for your sake.

subtitles.original: その声に意思を宿して
subtitles.english: Investing that voice with a will,

subtitles.original: 今、思いが響く
subtitles.english: now, the feelings resound.
